mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER (ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_GENDER) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberGender})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_GENDER FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
SELECT ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_GENDER FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_PASSWORD = #{memberPassword}
